queries.name: PRAU Standard
queries.query_text: project= PRAU and issuetype in standardIssueTypes() and issuetype != Epic

queries.name: Jira Admin
queries.query_text: project = 'JIRA Administration' AND issuetype not in (Epic, Program, subTaskIssueTypes())

queries.name: Yield YSYS
queries.query_text: (project = YIELD OR project = YDP AND issueFunction in epicsOf('project=YIELD')) AND  issuetype not in (Test, Epic, subTaskIssueTypes())

queries.name: IDA
queries.query_text: project = IDA AND (status = Backlog AND issuetype not in (Program, Epic) OR status != Backlog)
